entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is the one presenting evidence to the Ministry of Magic. He is tightly bound to a chair and his voice is scared but still has an unctuous note in it.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is the governing body that Karkaroff wants to help. It's trying to round up the last of the Dark Lord's supporters.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is present in the scene and has a familiar growling voice saying 'Filth'.

relationships.description: Karkaroff wants to help the Ministry of Magic in rounding up the last of the Dark Lord's supporters.
Dumbledore disapproves of Karkaroff, as evidenced by his growling voice saying 'Filth'.
